name: I Just Don't Know Anymore
description:
I... I just don't know anymore... 😔

Please use headphones 🎧 and consider full screen 💻

🕐 Playtime: ~5min

Controls

Try to find her heart

  • WASD/Arrows/Joystick move around
  • Space/Enter/A-button search
Known issues
  • Some people reported that sound doesn't work on Firefox. Try Chrome.
Attribution

Made by Sander Vanhove for the LowRez jam.

  • Made in Godot 3.5
  • Heartbeat sound
  • Laser zap sound
  • Comet sound
